page.title: 08 Beck Row Post Office
page.content: The only Post Office in the area was built about 53 years ago and is also a General Store selling food,vegetables, sweets, tobacco,cards,stationery,and other everyday items. It does a very good trade and is run by the owner and his wife and they employ one or two other people who live in the Village. The shop opens at 9.00a.m. and closes at 6.00p.m. every weekday and shuts at 1.00p.m. on Saturdays. On Sunday, the shop is closed all day. The owner is also a Councillor, who sits on the local Parish Council to represent the village of Beck Row. He is also one of the trustees for the Village Hall.
